short.am,ar,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: View ActiveCampaign contact information from anywhere on the Web.
short.bg: Вижте информация за контакт с ActiveCampaign отвсякъде в мрежата.
short.cs: Zobrazte údaje kontaktů ActiveCampaign odkudkoli na internetu.
short.de: Sehen Sie sich die Kontaktinformationen von ActiveCampaign von überall im Web an.
short.es: Ver la información de contacto de ActiveCampaign desde cualquier lugar en la Web.
short.fr: Consultez les coordonnées des contacts ActiveCampaign depuis n'importe quel emplacement sur le Web.
short.hu: Bárhol a weben megtekintheted az ActiveCampaign kapcsolattartói adatait
short.id: Lihat informasi kontak ActiveCampaign dari mana pun di Web.
short.it: Visualizza le informazioni di contatto ActiveCampaign ovunque ti trovi sul web.
short.nl: Bekijk ActiveCampaign contactgegevens van waar dan ook op het internet.
short.pl: Zobacz dane ActiveCampaign z dowolnego miejsca w sieci.
short.ru: Просматривайте контактную информацию ActiveCampaign из любой точки мира.
short.sl: Oglejte si informacije o stikih ActiveCampaign kjerkoli na spletu.

long.am,ar,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
Bring ActiveCampaign into your Gmail inbox!
Meaningfully connect and engage with your customers. Go beyond sales automation to optimize your customers’ experiences — while closing more deals, faster.

The ActiveCampaign extension brings the power of ActiveCampaign’s customer experience automation into your Gmail inbox. Seamlessly manage your marketing and sales processes, and control your email marketing, marketing automation, and CRM without even switching tabs.

A CRM THAT STAYS UP TO DATE & ORGANIZED
As you qualify your leads and opportunities, you can automatically create a new deal record in ActiveCampaign. As the deal progresses, you can move it through the stages of your pipeline. As you collect additional information about the contact or opportunity you can add that information to their contact record. You’ll never have to worry if your CRM is current. 

THE DATA YOU NEED, WHEN YOU NEED IT
Have all your contact data at your fingertips, right in your inbox next to the message you are typing. You’ll see your contact’s social network profiles, any tags you’ve applied, custom field values, any automated processes they are currently involved in, and open deal records associated with them. 

TIME-SAVING AUTOMATION MADE EASY
Without leaving Gmail, you’ll be able to trigger sequences of automated actions. When you learn what product a prospect is interested in, you can drop them into an automated follow-up sequence with targeted content and offers to move your sales process along faster. If a contact schedules an appointment, you can drop them into an automation that automatically reminds them one hour before and then follows-up with them after to see if they have any additional questions. Choose from hundreds of pre-built automations that you can use with just a few clicks.

LEARN MORE
Learn more about ActiveCampaign’s CRM functionality at: http://www.activecampaign.com/crm/

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you have a suggestion or concern, please visit and send us a message: http://www.activecampaign.com/contact/ We’ll respond quickly. 

ActiveCampaign's category-defining Customer Experience Automation Platform (CXA) helps over 150,000 businesses in 170 countries meaningfully engage with their customers. The platform gives businesses of all sizes access to 750+ pre-built automations that combine transactional email and email marketing, marketing automation and CRM for powerful segmentation and personalization across social, email, messaging, chat and text. Over 70% of ActiveCampaign's customers use its 870+ integrations including Microsoft, Shopify, Square, Facebook and Salesforce. ActiveCampaign scores higher in customer satisfaction than any other solution in Marketing Automation, CRM and E-Commerce Personalization on G2.com and is the Top Rated Email Marketing Software on TrustRadius. Pricing starts at just $9/month. Start a free trial at ActiveCampaign.com.
long.bg,cs,de,es,fr,hu,id,it,nl,pl,ru,sl:
ActiveCampaign helps businesses understand their contacts and power their sales processes. With an automated sales CRM you’ll meet your sales goals faster while creating raving fans.

The ActiveCampaign extension brings the power of ActiveCampaign’s marketing & sales automation to your Gmail inbox. Now, you’ll be able to work out of Gmail while seamlessly managing your marketing and sales processes. You’ll be able to access and control your email marketing, marketing automation, and CRM without even switching tabs. 

A CRM THAT STAYS UP TO DATE & ORGANIZED
As you qualify your leads and opportunities, you can create a new deal record in ActiveCampaign. As the deal progresses, you can move it through the stages of your pipeline. As you collect additional information about the contact or opportunity you can add that information to their contact record. Now you’ll never have to worry about keeping your CRM current. 

THE DATA YOU NEED, WHEN YOU NEED IT
As you move through your inbox, you’ll have all your contact data at your fingertips, right beside the message you are typing. You’ll see your contact’s social network profiles, any tags you’ve applied, custom field values, any automated processes they are currently involved in, and open deal records associated with them. 

TIME-SAVING AUTOMATION MADE EASY
Without leaving Gmail, you’ll be able to trigger sequences of automated actions. When you learn what product a prospect is interested in, you can drop them into an automated follow-up sequence with targeted content and offers to move your sales process along faster. If a contact schedules an appointment, you can drop them into an automation that automatically reminds them one hour before and follows-up with them after to see if they have any additional questions. What you can create is limited only by your imagination. 

LEARN MORE
Learn more about ActiveCampaign’s CRM functionality at: http://www.activecampaign.com/crm/

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you have a suggestion or concern, please visit and send us a message: http://www.activecampaign.com/contact/ We’ll respond quickly. 

Please note that the ActiveCampaign for Chrome extension is supported by classic Gmail, but some features may not work with the new 2018 Gmail.
